name: Pu Luong Paradise
address: Quốc lộ 15C, Huyện Bá Thước, Việt Nam
description:
Pu Luong Paradise có hồ bơi ngoài trời, khu vườn, sân hiên và nhà hàng ở Hương Bá Thước. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Thọ Xuân, cách khách sạn 93 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Vị trí rất tuyệt, đồ ăn ngon, nhân viên nhiệt tình

review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Cảnh Núi Non
review.comment_positive: nhân viên & quản lý thân thiện, chu đáo, phòng ốc rộng rãi, sạch sẽ, không gian cảnh quan thoáng đãng, đồ ăn cực kỳ ngon

review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Cảnh Núi Non
review.comment_positive:
We had the suite and it was amazing! Glass on three sides with beautiful views of the valley. 
Also the pool was a nice refresher after a long day.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive: It would be helpful if there was a menu to choose from in the restaurant.

review.room_type: Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể 10 Giường Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ
review.comment_positive: Very kind staffs. Though they don't speak english, they are helping you with kind hearts. Great value option in this area.
review.comment_negative: Hot shower didnt work perfectly for me.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Big and beautiful room. The staff is always available. The food is great. Surprised with a nice traditional party the first night.
review.comment_negative: No isolation, so it can be cold when the temperature outside is low. Hard to discuss with the staff as they do not speak english. The shared bathroom with the dormitory was pretty messy after the first night but was never cleaned. The place is quite isolated in the mountain, so that you are quite dependant on the hotel's restaurant to eat. But the organisation around the restaurant could be better: There is no menu for the food, you do not know the price of the food until the check out, the hot beverage often came out cold...

review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Cảnh Núi Non
review.comment_positive: Une vue exceptionnelle, loin des circuits touristiques, dans un petit paradis. Si vous cherchez un petit coin calme, je vous recommande. Le personnel est au petit soin pour vous.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Le lieu, le dinner et la vue de la chambre incroyable !

review.room_type: Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ
review.comment_positive: Tous !

review.rating: Très beau resort bien placé et accueillant
review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình nhìn ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
- l'emplacement et la vue magnifique sur les rizières et la montagne
- les repas délicieux
- le personnel très gentil
